co.paralleluniverse.actors.behaviors

Class Supervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.actors.ActorRef<Message>
      • co.paralleluniverse.actors.ActorRefDelegate<Object>
        • co.paralleluniverse.actors.behaviors.Behavior
          • co.paralleluniverse.actors.behaviors.Supervisor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Port<Object>, SendPort<Object>, Serializable, AutoCloseable

    public class Supervisor
extends Behavior

    An interface to a SupervisorActor.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Supervisor.ChildMode
      Determines whether a child (supervised) actor should be restarted if the supervisor’s restart strategy states that it should be restarted.
      static class  Supervisor.ChildSpec
      Describes a child actor’s configuration in a supervisor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Supervisor

        public Supervisor(ActorRef<Object> actor)

        If actor is known to be a ServerActor, creates a new Server interface to it. Normally, you don’t use this constructor, but the Supervisor instance returned by SupervisorActor.spawn().

        Parameters:
        actor - a ServerActor

    • Method Detail

      • addChild

        public final <T extends ActorRef<M>,M> T addChild(Supervisor.ChildSpec spec)
                                  throws SuspendExecution,
                                         InterruptedException

        Adds a new child actor to the supervisor. If the child has not been started, it will be started by the supervisor.

        Parameters:
        spec - the child's spec.
        Returns:
        the actor (possibly after it has been started by the supervisor).
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        SuspendExecution

      • getChild

        public final <T extends ActorRef<M>,M> T getChild(Object id)
                                  throws SuspendExecution,
                                         InterruptedException

        Retrieves a child actor by its id

        Parameters:
        id - the child’s id in the supervisor.
        Returns:
        the child, if found; null if the child was not found
        Throws:
        SuspendExecution
        InterruptedException

      • removeChild

        public final boolean removeChild(Object id,
                  boolean terminate)
                          throws SuspendExecution,
                                 InterruptedException

        Removes a child actor from the supervisor.

        Parameters:
        id - the child’s id in the supervisor.
        terminate - whether or not the supervisor should terminate the actor
        Returns:
        true if the actor has been successfully removed from the supervisor; false if the child was not found.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        SuspendExecution
